meanings.definition: Propose as a candidate for an election or appointment.
meanings.sent1: I will nominate my friend for class president.
meanings.sent2: The committee will nominate a new leader for the organization.
meanings.sent3: I decided to nominate my cat for the cutest pet award.
meanings.sent4: She always nominates herself for the role of team captain.
meanings.sent5: The teacher will nominate the most hardworking student for the award.

meanings.definition: Appoint to a position or office.
meanings.sent1: The company will nominate a new manager for the department.
meanings.sent2: The president will nominate a judge to the Supreme Court.
meanings.sent3: I jokingly nominate my dog as the office manager.
meanings.sent4: The CEO decided to nominate her assistant as the new vice president.
meanings.sent5: The board will nominate a qualified candidate for the position.

meanings.definition: Name someone for an honor or award.
meanings.sent1: They will nominate the best student for the scholarship.
meanings.sent2: The committee will nominate a recipient for the prestigious award.
meanings.sent3: I playfully nominate my sister for the 'Best Chef' title.
meanings.sent4: The school will nominate a deserving teacher for the recognition.
meanings.sent5: The community will nominate a hero for the bravery award.
